<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Alerts Count By Status</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/alert/count/{status}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns an alert count for the specified status.  

#### Rate Limits ####

The following rate limits apply:
* Request rate limit: 2/sec 
* Burst limit: 10/sec


## Request
